resources.string: Instant video conferences with your family, friends, and colleagues
Start or join a video meeting on the go
Send text messages to your team during the meeting
See the list of your previous meetings and rejoin them anytime.
Minimum length of meeting code allowed is %1$d (Spaces are not counted)
Click on the link below to join the meeting. \n\n%1$s
No Meeting Code found in the Clipboard
Unable to fetch data from the link. Please enter the meeting code manually.
Error creating Meeting link. Please try again.
You haven\'t joined any meetings yet. Create or Join any meeting from the home screen.
Download eMeet, do instant video conferences with your family, friends, and colleagues. \n\nhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=%1$s
Please check your internet connectivity and try again
Unknown error occurred. Please try again

The meeting code must be at least 10 digits long. Kindly note that the spaces in the meeting code are automatically removed and not considered while calculating the meeting code length. The Meeting code is not case sensitive. For example, the meeting codes ForthComingJournalismsBook and FORTHCOMINGJOURNALISMSBOOK will start the same meeting.

Instead of using the auto-generated meeting code, you can use your own custom meeting code. It needs to be an alphanumeric code with a length of at least 10 digits. Some examples of valid meeting codes are LatterCritiquesClassifyAlways, HugePersonalitiesSlipNext8745, ForthComingJournalismsBook, etc. Just make sure the meeting code is long enough so that the possibility of some random uninvited people joining the meeting is extremely low.

A meeting gets created when the first participant joins and is automatically ended when the last one leaves. If someone joins the meeting with the same meeting code again, a brand new meeting is created with the same name and there is no connection to any previous meeting that might have been held with the same name.

You can always password protect the meeting once it has started. However, keep in mind that the password will be reset once the meeting is ended. So make sure to set the password again if a meeting is rejoined after it was ended.
